attributes.action: Free top-up Theory Test for those who can’t get a Practical Test due to backlog
attributes.background:
Those who passed their Theory Test during COVID-19, should be honoured a free top-up Theory Test to extend their expiration date.

I had to cancel my original Practical as my driving instructor got COVID. I am now unable to book another Practical Test within the time frame of my Theory expiring.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Extend theory test certificates or offer free retake:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596206
